attributes.action: we want the groups or induviduals to be punished for football violence instead of the clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want fans to be punished for football violence instead of the clubs. We think this as clubs do not want there fans to fight as they are getting punished but yet the fans continue to do so. We want to football violence to be on the guilty hands of the hooligans them selves.
